DOC.brief_summary: 1 . To understand treatment pattern OACs baseline patient characteristic Japanese Non-Valvular Atrial Fibrillation ( NVAF ) patient 2 . To determine whether warfarin dabigatran new user group balance use propensity score match use pre-specified baseline covariates . 3 . As exploratory analysis , assess mean duration on-therapy follow-up time database
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Pattern Oral Anticoagulants ( OAC ) Japan
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients age > 18 yearold confirm diagnosis NVAF ( ICD 10 code I48 ) , new starter either dabigatran , warfarin , apixaban edoxaban , prescription OACs for12 month prior index date ( define first prescription OACs ( period define baseline period ) ) , index date 14 Mar 2011 30 June 2016 Exclusion criterion : Patients le 12 month enrolment prior index date , dialysis kidney transplant recipient baseline period , either atrial flutter , valvular AF , mechanical valve placement , rheumatic AF , and/or mitral valve prolapse/regurge/stenosis baseline period , record deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolism < 6 month Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) diagnosis baseline period
